content: Yes, Cafe de la Nouvelle Mairie is known for serving delicious coffee. They have an extensive selection of different coffee drinks, including espresso, cappuccino, and latte, all made with freshly roasted beans. They also offer a variety of teas, hot chocolate, and freshly squeezed juices. The cafe is particularly popular among locals for its quality coffee, so it's definitely worth a visit if you're a coffee lover!
